dc_title_s: A new map of New England, New York, New Iarsey, Pensilvania, Maryland, and Virginia / by Philip Lea.
dc_description_s: Covers Massachusetts, Rhode Island, Connecticut, southeastern New York, New Jersey, eastern Pennsylvania, Delaware, eastern Maryland, and eastern Virginia. Relief shown pictorially. Depths shown by soundings. Watermark. Includes inset of New York Harbor area. State 4 with addition of Lea as author and change of publisher. 1 map ; 45 x 54 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_publisher_sm: London, at the Great Toy, Spectacle, Chinaware, and Print Shop, at ye corner of Ludgate Street near St. Paul's : Sold by Geo : Willdey
